classic fps game, with the new joined players, now the cs:go is super fun. However, if your trust factory was low (due to some reason), you might meet a lot hackers.

This game is fantastic and honestly only get better as the years go by, I however would not recommend the game for casual "gamers". It tends to be frustrating sometimes if you don't understand mechanics and it takes quite a while to get them mastered. I have over 300+ hours in this game and would still consider myself a beginner lol

This game is mostly really fun. the community, the mechanics of the game, ect. But i think the most annoying ( and only think that is bad about the game) is the toxic, griefing players. they make your amazing game turn into a shit fest
